    Interface Description
    Flow.Dispatcher  
    Flow.TraversalCallback
    Supplied by Flow to the Listener, which is responsible for calling onComplete().
    History.Filter  
    StateParceler
    Used by History to convert your state objects to and from instances of Parcelable.
    ViewState  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Flow
    Holds the current truth, the history of screens, and exposes operations to change it.
    Flow.Traversal  
    FlowDelegate
    Manages a Flow within an Activity.
    FlowDelegate.NonConfigurationInstance

    Describes the history of a Flow at a specific point in time.

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NotPersistent
    Applied to a state object, indicates that it should not be persisted with the history.
